data.name: find n-frequently occurring words in text
data.description:
# n-frequent words

in this kata, you'll be given a string text and an int n. your task is to return a string[] of all words that occur ```n```  or more times in the text, and return an empty array if either no words occur ```n``` or more times OR if the given string is null or empty. these can be in any order! don't worry, the tests will take care of that.

ex:

  ```csharp
  NFrequency("i just wish that i could wish just wish", 2) => {"i", "just", "wish"}
  ```
  ```csharp
  NFrequency("", 1) => {}
  ```

(note: this is case sensitive. "Foo" will not be interpreted the same as "foo" or "foO".)

(second note: all test cases will be only letter characters and whitespace. you do not need to account for numbers or symbols.)

good luck!
